sentences.english: Counterfeit goods infringe customers' legal rights.
sentences.chinese: 伪劣商品侵越了消费者的合法权益。

sentences.english: Fake commodities can bring about great loss to both country and private property.
sentences.chinese: 假冒伪劣商品给国家和个人带来巨大的财产损失。

sentences.english: They accused suspected of producing and selling fake and inferior products, the crime of illegal business operation.
sentences.chinese: 他们指控涉嫌生产和销售假冒伪劣产品，非法经营罪。

sentences.english: The Chinese government has taken various effective measures to crack down on the counterfeit goods.
sentences.chinese: 中国政府已采取各种有效措施打击假冒伪劣商品。

sentences.english: He deceived the shopkeeper into purchasing a large quantity of fake commodities.
sentences.chinese: 他骗店主采购了大量的假冒伪劣商品。

sentences.english: Many evil merchants swindle the customers by imposing fake goods on them .
sentences.chinese: 许多无良商人用假冒伪劣商品坑害消费者。

sentences.english: The unlawful trader cheated the consumers by selling them fake and inferior commodities.
sentences.chinese: 这个不法商人销售伪劣商品坑骗消费者。

sentences.english: As is known to all, fake and inferior commodities harm the interests of consumers.
sentences.chinese: 众所周知，冒充伪劣商品损害了消耗者的长处。

sentences.english: Use your charm, but don't be phony.
sentences.chinese: 利用你的魅力，但是不要成为假冒伪劣产品。

sentences.english: As is known to all, fake and inferior commodities harm the interests of consumers.(=do a lot of harm to the interests of comsumers) 4.More and more people are realizing the importance of …
sentences.chinese: 众所周知，假冒伪劣商品损害了消费者的利益。

sentences.english: Why is there never a shortage of counterfeit and poor quality products in China?
sentences.chinese: 为什么假冒伪劣的产品在中国层出不穷？

sentences.english: Bs is known to all, fake and inferior commodities harm the interests of consumers.
sentences.chinese: 家喻户晓，假冒伪劣商品损害了消费者的好处。

sentences.english: In addition , fake commodities have equally affected some manufacturers with sound reputations .
sentences.chinese: 假冒伪劣商品同样会影响那些名牌企业的声誉。

sentences.english: There should be a law against people palming off rubbish like this.
sentences.chinese: 应该有一项禁止欺骗兜售伪劣产品的法令。

sentences.english: Many evil merchants swindle the customers by imposing fake goods on them to make profits.
sentences.chinese: 许多无良商人用假冒伪劣商品坑害消费者，赚取利益。

definition: to impersonate/to pose as (someone else)/to counterfeit/to palm off (a fake as a genuine)
to mix in fake material/to adulterate
to pass off fish eyes for pearls/to pass off fake products as genuine (idiom)
to counterfeit/to pass off a fake as genuine
